channel.title: ::ipcheck? or ::getips

item.title: ::ipcheck? or ::getips
item.dc:creator: @killerkody killerkody
item.description:
@killerkody wrote:

I have the command ::getip USERNAME, but when I get a certain amount of users i like to make sure no double loggers. Could someone give me command for ::getallips or something that gives me all ips logged onto the server that shows up in chat box. I like with this:
This is from my server base: pi 317
Could someone make this code into getall ip and make it list all the ips?

[code] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“getip”)) {
try {
String iptoget = playerCommand.substring(6);
for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {

						if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(iptoget)) {
							c.sendMessage("Ip:"+Server.playerHandler.players[i].connectedFrom);
						}
					}
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
				c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline.");
			}
		}[/code]

Read full topic
